propertiesMeta.name: accessright
propertiesMeta.description: Right which this rule defines.

propertiesMeta.name: group
propertiesMeta.description: Group to which this access right is given.

propertiesMeta.name: permission
propertiesMeta.description:
Permission for this access rule. 
Allow of one group overrides Deny/Inherit of another group. 
Deny will result in deny if we have no Allow of another group. 
Inherit will ask parent control when we got no Allow/Deny. If the parent does not define something there will be a specified default.

propertiesMeta.name: color
propertiesMeta.description: Color of this Box Shadow

propertiesMeta.name: offsetX
propertiesMeta.description: The Shadow Offset.

propertiesMeta.name: offsetXUnit
propertiesMeta.description: The Shadow Offset.

propertiesMeta.name: offsetY
propertiesMeta.description: The Shadow Offset.

propertiesMeta.name: offsetYUnit
propertiesMeta.description: The Shadow Offset.

propertiesMeta.name: inset
propertiesMeta.description: Inset shadows are drawn inside the border (even transparent ones), above the background, but below content.

propertiesMeta.name: blur
propertiesMeta.description: The larger this value, the bigger the blur, so the shadow becomes bigger and lighter.

propertiesMeta.name: blurUnit
propertiesMeta.description: The larger this value, the bigger the blur, so the shadow becomes bigger and lighter.

propertiesMeta.name: spread
propertiesMeta.description: Positive values will cause the shadow to expand and grow bigger, negative values will cause the shadow to shrink.

propertiesMeta.name: spreadUnit
propertiesMeta.description: Positive values will cause the shadow to expand and grow bigger, negative values will cause the shadow to shrink.

ControlAccessRight.description: An access right which is checked by controls. In the Schema a defaultValue of true mean access is granted, false is denied, null is ask parent.

name.description: Name of the access definition in the HTML.

displayName.description: Name which should be presented the user.

visible.description: Determine if an access definition is shown to the user.

description.description: A long description of this access definition.

defaultValueInternal.description: Defines the default of this control access right. This will be used if the check for this access right does not return a result. true mean access is granted, false is denied, null is ask parent.

objectType.description: An enum defining the variable type.
An enum defining the variable type.
An enum defining the variable type.
An enum defining the variable type.

Inputmode.description:
Defines which keyboard layout should be loaded in the system keyboard when interacting. The exact layout file is defined in the project. 
The most common one are: 'numeric', 'decimal', 'text'. Own project keywords are possible. 
'skip' ignores a focusIn, 'none' closes a keyboard on focusIn.

anyOf.description: 'skip' ignores a focusIn, 'none' closes a keyboard on focusIn.

propertiesMeta.name: angle
propertiesMeta.description: Angle this Gradient is defined

Locale.description: (Deprecated, use ProjectLocale from general) A list of locales for which we have a localization file in the project.

active.description: Should action be active? Defaults to true.

collapsed.description: Should action be collapsed? Not used in runtime

waitMode.description: Synchronous: Next step will called after last JavaScript line. Asynchronous: Next step will called after calling ctx.success() or ctx.error(TcHmi.Errors.ERROR)

success.description: Steps which will be called after call of ctx.success() with Asynchronous or last line with Synchronous.

error.description: Steps which will be called after call of ctx.success() with Asynchronous or an exception with Synchronous.

active.description: Should action be active? Defaults to true.

collapsed.description: Should action be collapsed? Not used in runtime

asyncWait.description: The next step is called after the completion of this step.

description.description: A long description of this control.

collapsed.description: Should action be collapsed? Not used in runtime

anyOf.title: Comment
anyOf.description: Free comment. Will be ignored on runtime.

active.description: Should action be active? Defaults to true.

collapsed.description: Should action be collapsed? Not used in runtime

preventDefault.description:
If activated the default action of the event will not be triggered.
If set on touch events the corresponding mouse events will not be triggered.

displayName.description: Name which should be presented the user.

virtualControlRight.description: Name of the right which is configured on a parent control (aka outer right).

controlRight.description: Name of the right which is working on this control (aka inner right).

items.description: Allows a mapping of rights to parent control virtual rights. For example the 'operate' right of this control can be configured to react on a custom 'canStartPump' right of a parent control.

VirtualControlRightMappingList.description: Allows a mapping of rights to parent control virtual rights. For example the 'operate' right of this control can be configured to react on a custom 'canStartPump' right of a parent control.

attributes.description: A dictionary for the attributes with the html attribute names as keys.

propertiesMeta.name: name
propertiesMeta.description: The name of the button. Used to identify it in events and for styling.

propertiesMeta.name: value
propertiesMeta.description: The value of the button. Used as an event parameter.

propertiesMeta.name: width
propertiesMeta.description: The width of the button in pixels.

propertiesMeta.name: height
propertiesMeta.description: The height of the button in pixels.

propertiesMeta.name: widthMode
propertiesMeta.description: The width mode of the button. If set to 'Content', the button will adjust itself to the length its text, ignoring the width value.

propertiesMeta.name: heightMode
propertiesMeta.description: The height mode of the button. If set to 'Content', the button will adjust itself to the height its text, ignoring the height value.

propertiesMeta.name: minWidth
propertiesMeta.description: The minimum width of the button in pixels.

propertiesMeta.name: maxWidth
propertiesMeta.description: The maximum width of the button in pixels.

propertiesMeta.name: minHeight
propertiesMeta.description: The minimum height of the button in pixels.

propertiesMeta.name: maxHeight
propertiesMeta.description: The maximum height of the button in pixels.

propertiesMeta.name: textPadding
propertiesMeta.description: The size of the padding around the text.

propertiesMeta.name: text
propertiesMeta.description: A string to display on the button. Can be bound to a symbol.

propertiesMeta.name: tooltip
propertiesMeta.description: An optional tooltip.

propertiesMeta.name: keepPopupOpen
propertiesMeta.description: Whether to close the popup when a button is pressed or keep it open. If not specified, this defaults to closing the popup.

propertiesMeta.name: actions
propertiesMeta.description: Actions to perform when the button is pressed.

propertiesMeta.name: width
propertiesMeta.description:
Defines width of the column in the grid. Can be a pixel value (42px), percent value (42%) or a grow factor (1).
The grow factor determines how much the items will grow relative to the rest of the items when positive free space is distributed.

propertiesMeta.name: widthUnit
propertiesMeta.description: Defines if the number defines a pixel value (px), percent value (42%) or grow factor (2).

propertiesMeta.name: widthMode
propertiesMeta.description: Defines if the width is taken from the width value or calculated from child controls in this Column.

propertiesMeta.name: maxWidth
propertiesMeta.description:
Defines maximal width of the column in the grid. Can be a pixel value (42px), percent value (42%).
max-width overrides width, but min-width overrides max-width.

propertiesMeta.name: minWidth
propertiesMeta.description:
Defines minimal width of the column in the grid. Can be a pixel value (42px), percent value (42%).
max-width overrides width, but min-width overrides max-width.

propertiesMeta.name: overflow
propertiesMeta.description: Defines if a control should be fully visible if it is outside of this column.

allOf.title: Width
allOf.description:
Defines width of the column in the grid. Can be a pixel value (42px), percent value (42%) or a grow factor (1).
The grow factor determines how much the items will grow relative to the rest of the items when positive free space is distributed.

allOf.description: Defines if the number defines a pixel value (px), percent value (42%) or grow factor (2).

allOf.title: WidthMode
allOf.description: Defines if the width is taken from the width value or calculated from child controls in this Column.

max-width overrides width, but min-width overrides max-width.

TcHmi.Controls.System.TcHmiGrid.Measurem.description:
Defines if the number defines a pixel value (px), percent value (42%) or grow factor (2).
The grow factor determines how much the items will grow relative to the rest of the items when positive free space is distributed.

propertiesMeta.name: height
propertiesMeta.description:
Defines height of the cells of this row in the grid. Can be a pixel value (42px), percent value (42%) or a grow factor (1).
The grow factor determines how much the items will grow relative to the rest of the items when positive free space is distributed.

propertiesMeta.name: heightUnit
propertiesMeta.description: Defines if the number defines a pixel value (px), percent value (42%) or grow factor (2).

propertiesMeta.name: heightMode
propertiesMeta.description: Defines if the height is taken from the height value or calculated from child controls in row.

propertiesMeta.name: maxHeight
propertiesMeta.description:
Defines maximal height of the row in the grid. Can be a pixel value (42px), percent value (42%).
max-height overrides height, but min-height overrides max-height.

propertiesMeta.name: minHeight
propertiesMeta.description:
Defines minimal height of the row in the grid. Can be a pixel value (42px), percent value (42%).
max-height overrides height, but min-height overrides max-height.

propertiesMeta.name: overflow
propertiesMeta.description: Defines if a control should be fully visible if it is outside of this row.

allOf.title: Height
allOf.description:
Defines height of the cells of this row in the grid. Can be a pixel value (42px), percent value (42%) or a grow factor (1).
The grow factor determines how much the items will grow relative to the rest of the items when positive free space is distributed.

allOf.title: HeightUnit
allOf.description: Defines if the number defines a pixel value (px), percent value (42%) or grow factor (2).

allOf.title: HeightMode
allOf.description: Defines if the height is taken from the height value or calculated from child controls in row.

allOf.title: MaxHeight

max-height overrides height, but min-height overrides max-height.

propertiesMeta.name: category
propertiesMeta.description:
An optional category which will be displayed above the item as a label (like <optgroup> in HTML).
Consecutive items that have the exact same category will all be displayed under one category.
However, if two items have the same category, but are not back to back, the category will be displayed twice to preserve the original item order.
For example items with categories [A, A, B, A] will create the category A with two entries, one category B with a single entry and after that again the category A with a single entry.

propertiesMeta.description: The name that is displayed.

propertiesMeta.name: showName
propertiesMeta.description: Specifies whether the name should be displayed in the value label.

propertiesMeta.name: showPercentLabel
propertiesMeta.description: Specifies whether the percentage label should be displayed.

propertiesMeta.name: showValueLabel
propertiesMeta.description: Specifies whether the value label should be displayed.

propertiesMeta.name: showUnit
propertiesMeta.description: Specifies whether the unit should be displayed in the value label.

propertiesMeta.name: x
propertiesMeta.description: x coordinate

propertiesMeta.name: y
propertiesMeta.description: y coordinate

propertiesMeta.name: lineColor
propertiesMeta.description: Color for this line

propertiesMeta.name: pointDotFillColor
propertiesMeta.description: Color for the fill of the dots

propertiesMeta.name: pointDotStrokeColor
propertiesMeta.description: Color for the stroke of the dots

propertiesMeta.name: yAxisId
propertiesMeta.description: Id of the y-axis to use for this graph

propertiesMeta.name: lineWidth
propertiesMeta.description: Line width in pixel

propertiesMeta.name: pointDot
propertiesMeta.description: Defines if the line has dots on the data points

propertiesMeta.name: pointDotRadius
propertiesMeta.description: Dot radius

propertiesMeta.name: pointDotStrokeWidth
propertiesMeta.description: Dot stroke width

propertiesMeta.name: legendName
propertiesMeta.description: The name that is displayed in the legend.

propertiesMeta.name: xScaleFactor
propertiesMeta.description: Scales all x values with this scale factor.

propertiesMeta.name: yScaleFactor
propertiesMeta.description: Scales all y values with this scale factor.

propertiesMeta.name: fillMode
propertiesMeta.description: Fill mode for the fill area

propertiesMeta.name: fillColor
propertiesMeta.description: Color for the fill area

propertiesMeta.name: fillTransparency
propertiesMeta.description: Fill transparency for the fill area

propertiesMeta.name: colorRanges
propertiesMeta.description: An array of colors to be used in different ranges.

propertiesMeta.name: defaultVisibility
propertiesMeta.description: Default value for visibility.

propertiesMeta.name: showAxisIfNoData
propertiesMeta.description: If showAxisIfNoData is true, the axis is always displayed; if false, the axis is only displayed if there are data sets assigned to the axis.

propertiesMeta.name: code
propertiesMeta.description: A Localization code like 'de-DE'.

propertiesMeta.name: text
propertiesMeta.description: Text to show for the defined localization code

TcHmi.Controls.Beckhoff.TcHmiObjectBrows.title: The hierarchical index of treeview data.

propertiesMeta.name: cellBackground
propertiesMeta.description: Background color of the cells in this column

propertiesMeta.name: textColor
propertiesMeta.description: Text color of the cells in this column

propertiesMeta.name: columnData
propertiesMeta.description: The data that will be displayed in the column.

propertiesMeta.name: width
propertiesMeta.description: Width for this column

propertiesMeta.name: widthUnit
propertiesMeta.description: Width unit for this column. px defines an absolute width, % is relative to the control width and factor can be used to divide the available space into fractions.

propertiesMeta.name: editable
propertiesMeta.description: Can this column be edited (text, number) or operated (button, checkbox)?

propertiesMeta.name: minWidth
propertiesMeta.description: Minimum width for this column

propertiesMeta.name: minWidthUnit
propertiesMeta.description: Minimum width unit for this column

propertiesMeta.name: resize
propertiesMeta.description: Can this column be resized? Columns that have factor as their widthUnit can never be resizeable.

propertiesMeta.name: sortable
propertiesMeta.description: Can this column be sortedby user interaction?

propertiesMeta.name: horizontalAlignment
propertiesMeta.description: Horizontal alignment of this column

propertiesMeta.name: verticalAlignment
propertiesMeta.description: Vertical alignment of this column

propertiesMeta.name: headerHorizontalAlignment
propertiesMeta.description: Horizontal alignment of the header of this column

propertiesMeta.name: headerVerticalAlignment
propertiesMeta.description: Vertical alignment of the header of this column

propertiesMeta.name: format
propertiesMeta.description: A reference of function which is called with each entry

requiredArguments.description: Meta data of the value. Includes the json schema.

propertiesMeta.name: ignoreEscapeSequences
propertiesMeta.description: When set to true a backslash in a text will be shown verbatim in the HMI

propertiesMeta.name: autoFocusOut
propertiesMeta.description: When set to true the control will automatically lose focus when the user presses the enter or escape key

propertiesMeta.name: autoSelectText
propertiesMeta.description: When set to true all text within the control will be selected when the control gains focus

propertiesMeta.name: state
propertiesMeta.description: State Value

propertiesMeta.name: stateIcon
propertiesMeta.description: Icon Path for this entry.

propertiesMeta.name: iconPath
propertiesMeta.description: The icon that will be displayed in the tab bar.

propertiesMeta.name: name
propertiesMeta.description: Name of the Tab.

propertiesMeta.name: displayName
propertiesMeta.description: Name of the Tab that will be displayed in the tab bar.

propertiesMeta.name: targetFileHostPreload
propertiesMeta.description: Defines whether the target file host is preloaded when the tab navigation control is initialized or loaded when the tab is selected.

propertiesMeta.name: targetFileHostPreAttach
propertiesMeta.description: Defines whether the target file host is pre attached to the DOM even if the tab is not yet selected. Does only have an effect if TargetFileHostPreload is true.

propertiesMeta.name: targetFileHostKeepAlive
propertiesMeta.description: Defines whether the target file host is kept alive when the tab is unselected. Has no effect when TargetFileHostPreload is set to true.

propertiesMeta.name: scrolling
propertiesMeta.description: Defines whether a content is scrollable. Possible values are No, Yes, Auto. Does not affect user controls.

propertiesMeta.name: hidden
propertiesMeta.description: Defines whether the tab is hidden or not.

propertiesMeta.name: horizontalAlignment
propertiesMeta.description: Horizontal alignment of the text in the tab bar.

propertiesMeta.name: verticalAlignment
propertiesMeta.description: Vertical alignment of the text in the tab bar.

propertiesMeta.name: icon
propertiesMeta.description: The Icon displayed in the tab bar.
